Class Projectile

java.lang.Object
  greenfoot.Actor
      Projectile

public class Projectile
extends greenfoot.Actor

The Projectile superclass contains the subclasses PlayerShot and Fireball. Each projectile is spawned by an object and is removed when it touches the edge of the world.

Version:
June 13, 2014
Author:
Terrence Hung

protected  void checkWorldEdge()
          Checks if the projectile is at the edge of the world.
protected  void remove()
